thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 19 of 2268
thread.title: Christopher Wood

author: Christopher Wood
title: Christopher Wood
text:
Although i have ended up with blinds i cannot use, I have had a great experince from Blinds2Go.
The blinds arrived promptly but were evidently dropped in transit which caused some damage to the mechanics.
It did take 4 days for my email to be repsonded to but the service was great. A part was offered to be sent out to me but by this time i had made arrnagemnets to replace the blind. Following this, a refund was offered and processed quickly.
The blind itself appeared of great quality and certainly looked like a true Black Out blind. Such a shame about the damage (which i assume was UPS' fault) and length of time for service to get in touch but my experince was overall good.
I am not even slightly put off using Blinds2Go in the future.
